description:
While Luffy and the others are enjoying the futuristic machines of Egghead, someone who resembles Bartholomew Kuma comes after them. When Luffy tries to fight back, Bonney stops him and reveals her shocking relationship with Kuma.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bonney no Doukoku! Miraijima ni Hisomu Yami
Bonney`s Lamentation! Darkness Lurking on the Future Island
Bonneys Tränenausbruch! – Finsternis verbirgt sich auf der Zukunftsinsel
Les sanglots de Bonney. La part d`ombre de l`île futuriste !
فاجعة بوني! الجزء المظلم من جزيرة المستقبل!
ボニーの慟哭! 未来島に潜む闇
